name: PHILIPS StraightCare Essential Straightener HP8401/00 Hair Straightener
desc: Straighten and style your hair with this easy-to-use Philips straightener. This product makes styling at home quick and convenient. Look your best for all those important selfie moments.

content.heading: Keratin infusion for better care
content.p: Keratin is the hair’s essential ingredient which makes them strong, healthy and gorgeous looking. The ceramic is enriched with keratin to even better take care of your hair.

content.heading: Fast heat up time, ready to use in 60 seconds
content.p: The straightener has a fast heat-up time, being ready to use in 60 seconds.

content.heading: 210°C professional temperature for perfect salon results
content.p: This styling temperature enables you change the shape of your hair, and gives you that perfect look like you’ve just come from the salon.

content.heading: Cool Tip to easily create curls and waves
content.p: The tip of the styler is made from a special heat insulating material to keep it cool. You can safely hold it while you’re curling to create beautiful curls, waves and bouncy styles.

content.heading: A useful swivel cord rotates and prevents tangled wires
content.p: The swivel cord technology conveniently rotates the cord and prevents unnecessary tangles.

name: PHILIPS DryCare HP8108/00 Hair Dryer
desc:
2 flexible speed settings for gentle drying
Foldable handle for easy storage
Narrow concentrator for focused airflow and cool air setting for extra gentle drying
Compact design for easy handling and 1.5 meter cord for maximum flexibility
1000W Power for gentle drying and 2 years of worldwide guarantee

content.heading: Easily dry and style your hair

This Philips Essential hairdryer packs the perfect balance of drying and styling power. The dryer is compact and can easily be used at home or taken on the road. Get the beautiful and gentle results you desire, wherever you go.
1000W power for gentle drying.
content.p: This Philips DryCare 1000W hairdryer creates the optimal level of airflow and gentle drying for beautiful results everyday.

content.heading: 2 flexible speed settings for gentle drying
content.p: This hairdryer offers 2 pre-selected speed/heat combinations to make it quick and easy to achieve the perfect style.

content.heading: Foldable handle for easy storage
content.p: This hairdryer has foldable handle, making it easy to pack, store and take with you anywhere you go.

content.heading: Narrow concentrator for focused airflow
content.p: The concentrator focuses airflow through the opening to specific areas. This results in better touch-ups or more precise styling to finish your look.

content.heading: Compact design for easy handling
content.p: Compact and ergonomic, this hairdryer benefits from a clever modern design. This results in a dryer that is light and easy to handle yet small enough to store virtually anywhere.

content.heading: Cool air setting for extra gentle drying
content.p: The cool air setting allows you to dry your hair at a more caring temperature, perfect for gentle drying and minimizing damage during the hot summer seasons

name: HairCare Manufacturing Glitterdream Spray Bottle
manual: Using the Glitterdream spray bottle is a straightforward process. Begin by selecting the appropriate liquid, filling the bottle, and securing the cap. You can adjust the spray pattern by rotating the nozzle, and before spraying, it's crucial to prime the pump by squeezing it a few times to create pressure within the bottle. Aim, press the trigger, and adjust the nozzle if needed. After use, release any remaining pressure, clean the nozzle regularly, and store the spray bottle in a cool, dry place to keep it in optimal condition for a wide range of applications, from cleaning to gardening or personal care.
desc: Introducing the Glitterdream Spray Bottle – your ticket to a world of shimmering, magical moments! This enchanting spray bottle is not your ordinary utility; it's a dazzling fusion of functionality and fantasy. Crafted to elevate your everyday routines, Glitterdream adds a touch of whimsy to your life.

content.content: Clear Glass Bottles, with Black Fine Mist Sprayers, and Dust caps.
Perfect for essential oils, perfume oils, or other liquids.
Excellent for travel, conveniently fits in your purse.

name: HairCare Manufacturing Glitterdream Steamer
manual: Using the Glitterdream hair steamer is a breeze. Fill the water reservoir with distilled water, and ensure that the device is placed on a flat, stable surface. Power it on, and the steamer will begin producing a fine mist. Adjust the steam level using the intuitive controls to suit your preferences. Position your hair in the steam's path, keeping a comfortable distance to prevent burns. Enjoy the soothing and hydrating mist as it nourishes your hair, enhancing the effectiveness of your hair care routine. After use, simply power off the steamer and unplug it. Remember to empty any remaining water from the reservoir and allow the device to cool before storing it. With Glitterdream Hair Steamer, you're on your way to luxuriously conditioned, vibrant hair.
desc: The Glitterdream hair steamer is perfect for deep conditioning natural hair, masks, and oil treatments. The heat from the heat cap will open up the hair cuticle and allow products deeper penetration into strands. As a result, your products will be able to work better and help repair your hair.

name: HairCare Manufacturing Glitterdream Scalp Exfoliator & Massager
desc: Featuring long, flexible teeth that help detox the scalp by removing product build-up and dead skin, while short, thick teeth stimulate pressure points for a relaxing massage, the Glitterdream hair massager is a multi-tasking marvel with dual teeth that help detox the scalp, clear product build-up, and provide some massage-based TLC.

name: HairCare Manufacturing Glitterdream Bouffant Spa Cap
manual: Using the Glitterdream Spa Cap is a luxurious and simple process. Start by applying your favorite hair treatment or conditioner to your hair. Place the spa cap over your head, ensuring that your hair is entirely enclosed within it. Secure the cap snugly but comfortably using the adjustable strap. Activate the cap's built-in heating element to your desired temperature, and let it work its magic for the recommended treatment duration. Relax, unwind, and let the gentle warmth enhance the absorption of your hair treatment for soft, lustrous locks. When the treatment is complete, switch off the heating element and remove the cap, revealing your revitalized, pampered hair.
desc: The Glitterdream Bouffant Spa Cap from HairCare Manufacturing offers sanitary comfort and simple convenience for the salon or spa. Our single-use line of wearables blends sophisticated design with practical functionality for an array of products ideal for sunless spray tanning, spa treatments, and other salon services. Each style is designed to provide a sanitary, single use solution for any spa treatment. Its one-size-fits-most style offers coverage and modesty to ensure client comfort.

name: L'Oréal Paris Elvive Dream Lengths No Haircut Cream
manual: Apply leave-in conditioner on dry or wet hair. In case of contact with eyes, rinse them immediately and thoroughly. Elvive No Haircut Cream is also perfect to use just before hair dryer or straightener, as it offers heat damage protection up to 180°C! Use it after Dream Lengths Shampoo and Conditioner.
desc: Introducing Elvive Dream Lengths for long, damaged hair. Formulated with a blend of castor oil and vitamins B3 and B5, Dream Lengths strengthens long hair and helps seals split ends. For the long hair of your dreams! Our creamy Restoring Shampoo adds shine, protects lengths, and strengthens hair, while our nourishing Super Detangler Conditioner instantly detangles hair to reduce hair breakage. Our No Haircut Cream Leave In Treatment helps seal split ends so you can save that last inch. It also prevents heat damage from styling because it offers up to 450°F heat protection.
specifications: Ricinus Communis Seed Oil/Castor Seed Oil

name: Head & Shoulders Royal Oils Scalp Cream
manual: Use daily to nourish and protect scalp. Place the tip directly on scalp and squeeze bottle, moving from front of scalp to back, ensuring the entire scalp is treated. Use fingers to massage into scalp. Can be used up to four times daily. *With regular use.
desc: Prevent dryness and itch, seal in moisture and extend the life of your favorite hairstyle with Head & Shoulders Royal Oils Daily Moisture Scalp Cream. This leave-in, daily hair moisturizer helps restore scalp health* and provides all day protection*, resulting in beautiful, healthy hair. The light, absorbing formula is great as a leave in conditioner, and can be used up to four times daily. Expertly designed specifically for natural, relaxed, kinky, and coily hair types, this itchy scalp treatment is dye and sulfate free, and free of mineral oils. It’s the perfect deep conditioner for protective styles, twists and locs, with no need to rinse. Anoint your crown with nothing but the best scalp care. Developed for Black hair by Black scientists, the entire Head and Shoulders Royal Oils line helps balance natural moisture levels for healthy hair and scalp.

name: L'Oréal Paris Elvive Dream Lengths Hair Mask
manual: Apply the nourishing hair care mask for 2-3 minutes, then rinse. Lightly squeeze the water out of your hair with your hands and tap gently with your towel. Do not rub your hair too hard to prevent damage and breakage.
desc:
Elvive Dream Lengths Savior Mask is enriched with a hair care cocktail of VEGETAL KERATIN, VITAMINS & CASTOR OIL to:

- Repair and restore lengths

- Nourish and strengthen hair fiber

- Boost shine
specifications: Ricinus Communis Seed Oil / Castor Seed Oil

name: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Dream Lengths Restoring Shampoo
manual:
Follow these simple steps to get the most out of this repairing shampoo:
Step 1. Add a quarter-size dollop of shampoo to wet hair and massage.
Step 2. Work up a lather.
Step 3. Rinse thoroughly and then follow up with Elvive Dream Lengths Conditioner for Long, Damaged Hair.
desc: Elvive Dream Lengths Restoring Shampoo for Long, Damaged Hair is a must-have for your long hair goals. Created with a blend of fine castor oil, vitamins B3 and B5, it reduces breakage and visibly repairs hair damage without weighing down your strands.
specifications: Ricinus Communis Seed Oil / Castor Seed Oil

name: Head & Shoulders Clinical Dandruff Defense Intensive Itch Shampoo
manual: For best results use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor. For maximum control, use every time you shampoo. Shake before use. Wet hair, massage onto scalp, rinse, repeat if desired. Caution: if used on bleached, tinted, grey, or permed hair, rinse for 5 minutes.
desc: Introducing NEW Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense Intensive Itch Relief Shampoo, brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist-recommended brand. Our formula provides prescription strength flake protection (vs prescription dandruff shampoo 2% ketoconazole) and provides soothing relief from itch associated with dandruff. Clinically proven to protect against flakes and dandruff, our shampoo is a great remedy for an itchy scalp. Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense + Intensive Itch Relief shampoo is infused with intense cooling menthol. Soothe your scalp and hair for a healthy, vibrant look you'll love.

name: Head & Shoulders Clinical Dandruff Defense Advanced Oil Control Shampoo

/img/head-and-shoulders/Clinical Dandruff Defense Advanced Oil Control Shampoo 2.jpg

/img/head-and-shoulders/Clinical Dandruff Defense Advanced Oil Control Shampoo 7.jpg
manual: For best results use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor. For maximum control, use every time you shampoo. Shake before use. Wet hair, massage onto scalp, rinse, repeat if desired. Caution: if used on bleached, tinted, grey, or permed hair, rinse for 5 minutes.
desc: Introducing NEW Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense + Advanced Oil Control Shampoo, brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist-recommended brand. Our formula provides prescription strength flake protection (vs prescription dandruff shampoo 2% ketoconazole) and removes oil and flakes to relieve dandruff symptoms. Clinically proven to protect against flakes and dandruff, our shampoo is a great remedy for an oily scalp. Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense Advanced Oil Control shampoo is infused with refreshing citrus. Soothe your scalp and hair for a healthy, vibrant look you'll love.

name: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Dream Lengths Super Detangling Conditioner
manual: Apply to lengths only to avoid greasy roots. Leave on for 1-3 minutes and rinse.
desc: Help seal split ends in just 1 use with Elvive Dream Lengths formulated with fine castor oil and vitamins B3 and B5.
specifications: Ricinus Communis Seed Oil / Castor Seed Oil
Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein

name: Head & Shoulders Royal Oils Scalp Balancing Conditioner
manual: For best results use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor. Apply to wet hair after shampooing by gently massaging onto hair and scalp, rinse well.
desc: Indulge your scalp and hair with the decadent moisture of Head & Shoulders Royal Oils Moisture Renewal Conditioner with Coconut Oil. Starting on day 1, this moisturizing formula helps balance essential scalp moisture giving you long-lasting protection.* Use it on wash days after shampooing to soak scalp in lasting moisture.* This sulfate, paraben and dye-free conditioner is the perfect way to give all natural, relaxed, kinky and coily hair types a boost of lasting nourishment and scalp protection.* Proudly recommended by My Black is Beautiful.*with regular use

name: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Dream Lengths Frizz Killer Leave-In Serum
manual: After using Dream Lengths shampoo and conditioner use 1-2 pumps on damp hair before blow-drying. Once dry, flat iron. To tame frizz and static, apply a small amount on dry hair.
desc: This leave-in serum tames frizzy hair, static and flyaways and also protects against heat damage up to 450F degrees when applied before blow drying or flat ironing

name: Head & Shoulders Supreme Hydrating Scalp Serum
manual: Apply to affected areas one to four times daily or as directed by a doctor. Twist the cap open. Place tip directly onto scalp (damp or dry). Gently squeeze the bottle while moving tip from front to back of your scalp. Repeat to cover your entire scalp. Massage for even distribution. Do not rinse.
desc: Beautiful hair starts with a healthy scalp. Hydrate yours with Supreme hydrating scalp serum, brought to you by Head & Shoulders, America's #1 dermatologist-recommended brand. Infused with Vitamin E and Argan Oil, this hydrating scalp treatment reinvigorates scalp in between washes leaving it refreshed and renewed. To use it, add a few drops directly to your scalp anytime, anywhere.

name: L'Oréal Paris Elnett Satin Extra Strong Hold Hairspray
images: /img/LOreal/Elnett Extra Strong Hold Travel Size Hairspray.1.jpg
/img/LOreal/Elnett Extra Strong Hold Travel Size Hairspray.2.jpg
/img/LOreal/Elnett Extra Strong Hold Travel Size Hairspray.3.jpg
manual: Remove security tab and shake can. Spray from 12 inches away. Elnett’s micro-diffusion spray distributes mist evenly to finish, maintain, and hold previously styled hair.
desc:
New Elnett formula delivers the same hold you love without compromise. Our luxe spray delivers brushable hold with only 6 Ingredients.

Elnett Extra Strong Hold- Delivers a firm, touchable hold that lasts all day. No crunch. No residue. Stylist approved.

Humidity Resistant- Helps protect styles from frizz. Formulas lock in style day and night. Pro-Tip- Spray Elnett onto hairbrush then brush through hair for a soft, frizz-free finish.

Micro Diffusion Technology- Disperses spray evenly for strand-by-strand hold.

A Stylist Favorite- An iconic secret. Hairdressers worldwide have turned to Elnett for decades. So strong, its hold lasts all day. So fine, it disappears at the stroke of a brush. No stickiness, stiffness or visible residue.

name: L'Oréal Paris Elvive Extraordinary Oil For All Hair
manual: Rub 3 or 4 drops on hair, Apply evenly through wet or dry hair, Apply before shampoo to nourish, before styling to protect and transform, or as a finishing touch for sumptuous softness.
desc: Dry hair can lack nourishment leaving it feeling rough, dull and lifeless. Now bathe your hair in luxurious , oil-rich formulas for hair that feels nourished from root to tip with the Elvive Extraordinary Oil range. Nourish your dry hair with Elvive Extraordinary Oil. Use Elvive Extraordinary Oil alongside the nourishing shampoo, conditioner and hair mask. Elvive Extraordinary Oil is a hair care product designed for use by all hair types. Enriched with a precious blend of 6 flower extracts the non-greasy feel formula leaves hair looking soft, shiny and Weightless. The product is ultra versatile: It can be used before shampooing for nourishment, before styling to help protect and transform your hair, or as a finishing touch for exceptional shine. This product offers heat protection for up to 230°C.

content.content: Elvive Extraordinary Oil for dry hair that lacks nourishment making hair feel rough, dull and lifeless, Luxurious, oil-rich formula nourishes from root to tip
Leaves your hair feeling beautifully nourished, soft and supple, Weightless finishing touch designed for use by all hair types
Non greasy formula made with luxurious oils: 6 flower oil extracts with nourishing properties for luxurious shine & no flyaways, Heat protection from up to 230°C protection
Contents: 1x L'Oreal Hair Oil, by Elvive Extraordinary Oil, For Dry to Very Dry Hair, Volume: 100ml

specifications: Chamomilla Recutita Extract/Matricaria Flower Oil Extract
